EdrawMax V12.5.2
1. Adjust page zoom
Global Settings: [Home] Options→Default Settings→Set Default Page Size→Scale Ratio
Page Settings: [Edit Page] Design → Page Settings → Expand the window button in the lower right corner
2. Optimize the import/export function
Optimized the export of PDF - the selected page supports direct drop-down to select the page and then export
Fixed the problem that the connection line was misplaced and the text disappeared after exporting the VSD format file
Fixed the problem that the program crashed and the graphics disappeared after exporting to EPS/SVG format files
3. Other
Fixed the problem that the map is stuck when dragging, and the color of the map filling in the right panel does not take effect
The area unit of the optimized floor plan is changed from sq.m to ㎡
Fix the nps pop-up window popping up multiple times in a short period of time
